title: How to Delete Word Documents on a Mac

steps.title: Open the document location in finder.
steps.content: Open the document location in finder.

steps.title: Select the document.
steps.content: Select the document. It should be highlighted in blue.

steps.title: Right click (Ctrl and click) on the selected document.
steps.content: Right click ( Ctrl and click) on the selected document.

steps.title: Open Microsoft Word.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Word. This method will only work if the document has been edited on the activate computer before.

steps.title: In the startup window that is shown on launch, select Recent or Recent Documents (depending on which version of Word you are using).
steps.content: In the startup window that is shown on launch, select Recent or Recent Documents (depending on which version of Word you are using).

steps.title: Scroll through the list until the desired document is found.
steps.content: Scroll through the list until the desired document is found.

steps.title: Right-click (Ctrl and click) on the highlighted document.
steps.content: Right-click ( Ctrl and click) on the highlighted document.
